ProductInfo.Features:
SUNLUXY 4 channel, fully integrated, real time, hardware-based digital video recorder.
Support Pan/Tilt/Zoom (PTZ) camera control, network access and USB2.0 backup.
H.264 compression technology, record amazing quality video without using up a large amount of storage space.
A variety of recording modes are supported: scheduled recording, motion detected recording, continuous recording, or a combination of any modes.
Support Remote View via smartphone & 3G Mobile with each of those systems a)Android ; b)iPhone & iPad IOS; c)Symbian ; d)Windows Mobile.
ProductInfo.Name: SUNLUXY® 4 Channel H.264 Real Time Video Surveillance DVR Recorder with 500GB Hard Drive for CCTV Security System
